WRITING.TEXT: Better than Lil Yatchy I guess ha

Aaron Burr, he was actually a great revolutionary during the war but was constantly passed on by none other than George Washington, as well as being a smart politician and lawyer (albeit not always complete sound morally) but it all revolved around him not being given the respect he deserved. If he died early on in his political career he might of received recognition for his greatness instead of being remembered as that guy who killed a founding father
